artist.description: Name of the artist that illustrated the card art.

asciiName.description: The {{link@ASCII@http://www.asciitable.com}} (Basic/128) code formatted card name with no special unicode characters.

availability.description: List of the card's available printing types.

colorIdentity.description: List of all the colors found in {{code@manaCost}}, {{code@colorIndicator}} and {{code@text}}.

colorIndicator.description: List of all the colors in the color indicator (The symbol prefixed to a card's types).

colors.description: List of all the colors in {{code@manaCost}} and {{code@colorIndicator}}. Some cards may not have a value, such as cards with "Devoid" in its {{code@text}}.

convertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the card.

count.description: How many of this card exists in a relevant deck.
count.notes: Only available on a card from a {{link@Deck@/documentation/data-models/deck/}} data model.

duelDeck.description: An indicator for which duel deck the card is in.

faceConvertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the face of either half or part of the card.

faceName.description: Name on the face of the card.

flavorName.description: Promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards.

flavorText.example: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."
flavorText.description: Italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.

foreignData.description: Foreign data entries for a card. See the {{link@Foreign Data@/documentation/data-models/foreign-data/}} data model.

frameVersion.description: Version of the card frame style.

hand.description: Starting maximum hand size total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer.

hasContentWarning.description: If the card marked by Wizards of the Coast for having sensitive content. Cards with this property may have missing or degraded properties and values.

hasFoil.description: If the card be found in foil.

hasAlternativeDeckLimit.description: If the card allows a value other than 4 copies in a deck

hasNonFoil.description: If the card can be found in non-foil

identifiers.description: Identifiers of a card. Includes MTGJSON and partner identifiers. See the {{link@Identifiers@/documentation/data-models/identifiers/}} data model.

isAlternative.description: The card has some kind of alternative variation to its printed counterpart.

isFoil.description: If the card is in foil.
isFoil.notes: Only available on a card from a {{link@Deck@/documentation/data-models/deck/}} data model.

isFullArt.description: If the card has full artwork.

isOnlineOnly.description: If the card is only available in Magic: The Gathering Online.

isReprint.description: If the card has been reprinted.

isReserved.description: If the card is on the Magic: The Gathering {{link@Reserved List@https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/official-reprint-policy-2010-03-10}}.

isStarter.description: If this card is found in a booster pack.

isStorySpotlight.description: If the card has a story spotlight.

isTextless.description: If the card does not have a text box.

isTimeshifted.description: If this card is "timeshifted", a feature from Time Spiral block.

keywords.description: All keywords found on a card.

leadershipSkills.description: If a card can be a commander in certain game formats. See the {{link@Leadership Skills@/documentation/data-models/leadership-skills/}} data model.

legalities.description: The legal capacity of a card in a game format. See the {{link@Legalities@/documentation/data-models/legalities/}} data model.

life.description: Starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

name.description: Names of each face on the card. Cards with multiple faces, like "Split" and "Meld" cards are given a delimiter. Example: {{code@Face 1 Name // Face 2 Name}}.

number.description: Number of the card. Can be prefixed or suffixed with a {{code@*}} or other character for promo sets.

originalText.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"
originalText.description: Text on the card as originally printed.

originalType.description: Type as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

otherFaceIds.description: List of UUID's of this card with counterparts, such as transformed or melded faces.

printings.description: List of sets the card was printed in, in uppercase.

promoTypes.description: List of promotional types for a card.

purchaseUrls.description: URLs to purchase the card products on affiliates. See the {{link@Purchase Urls@/documentation/data-models/purchase-urls/}} data model.

reverseRelated.description: The names of the cards that produce this card.

rulings.description: The rulings of a card as described by Wizard of the Coast. See the {{link@Rulings@/documentation/data-models/rulings/}} data model.

side.description: Identifier of the card side. Used on cards with multiple faces.

subtypes.description: List of card subtypes found after em-dash.

supertypes.description: List of card supertypes found before em-dash.

text.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"

type.description: Type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

types.description: List of all "card types" of the card, including Un-sets and gameplay variants.

uuid.description: A universal unique ID (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.

variations.description: List of UUID's of this card with alternate printings in the same set. Excludes Un-sets.

watermark.description: Name of the watermark on the card.
